<div>\n  Accounting Supervisor - Latin America &amp; Government Reporting-220018K\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <b> Description<\u002Fb>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <p><br> Supervises the timely preparation of financial statements, internal reports, supporting analyses, and other ad-hoc requests related to Valero’s operations in Latin America. Ensures government surveys and state reporting requirements are completed and reported timely. Coaches, evaluates, and provides constructive feedback to staff. Acts as liaison between staff and upper management. Serves as a resource to others in the resolution of complex problems and issues.<\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Supervises the preparation of and reviews the following financial reporting documents related to the Latin America operations: \n    <ul>\n     <li>Month-end journal entries;<\u002Fli> \n     <li>Monthly basic financial statements in accordance with U.S. GAAP, including various supplemental schedules and variance analyses;<\u002Fli> \n     <li>Monthly Business Unit Reports summary and statistical analysis, including margin analysis and volumetric reports (by region and by product), administrative and operating expense summaries;<\u002Fli> \n     <li>Monthly binder used in communicating results to upper management; and<\u002Fli> \n     <li>Documents that support the annual audited financial statements of Valero Peru in accordance with IFRS.<\u002Fli> \n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n   <li>Supervises the maintenance of the applicable statutory chart of accounts to ensure alignment with U.S. GAAP and IFRS requirements.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Performs research on inquiries made by teams in Mexico and Peru, and assists Director with coordination of issue resolution with appropriate personnel.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Supervises the preparation of and reviews the government surveys (monthly, quarterly, and annual) and ensures they are submitted timely.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Supervises the preparation of and coordinates with external parties the completion of the annual unclaimed property reporting. Stays current on changes in law and regulations.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Supervises ad-hoc requests made by management.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>This position is salaried exempt status, which means you are not eligible for overtime pay.<\u002Fp> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <b> Qualifications<\u002Fb>\n  <div> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <ul> \n   <li>Bachelor’s degree in Accounting required.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Minimum of eight years of accounting experience, equivalent public accounting, and \u002For auditing experience required.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Bilingual in English and Spanish (read, write, and speak) required.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>CPA license preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in refining or petroleum marketing industry preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Thorough understanding of U.S. GAAP, theories, and ability to apply them to the Company’s accounting needs preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to understand and apply concepts under IFRS preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to read and interpret company policies, regulatory guidelines, and other work-related documentation preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to abide by confidentiality requirements when working with sensitive information, results, and communications preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Skill in providing thorough, efficient, and effective customer service to individuals at all levels within the organization preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to communicate effectively through written and verbal methods preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to accomplish work within required timelines, including short, long, and emergency timeframes preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to cross-train in other department duties to ensure efficient coverage of department responsibilities preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to work with others to accomplish challenging assignments preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to multi-task and prioritize multiple assignments to ensure completion of tasks within stated time requirements preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in an international public accounting firm preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Working knowledge of SAP preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Advanced skills using Microsoft Office programs (i.e., Word and Excel) preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Understanding of Power BI data analytics preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to travel abroad to Mexico and Peru preferred.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>Position level and salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.<br> <br> Valero's <div>\n  Database Administration Specialist - SQL Server-22001DY\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <b> Description<\u002Fb>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <p><br> Valero provides the energy to take people anywhere they want go around the globe. Our employees work together as a team with the primary goal of maintaining our status as a top petroleum refiner and ethanol producer in the marketplace. As an employee at Valero, not only will you have an opportunity to impact people’s lives through the products we manufacture in a safe, reliable environment, you will also be a part of a culture that thrives on positively impacting the lives of the people in the communities that we work and live in.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>As a Database Administration Specialist on the DBA team, you will be responsible for building and operating the database infrastructure used by all business applications. The primary focus will be with SQL Server, Oracle and SAP HANA database platforms - working closely with functional teams, as well as other I\u002FS teams, on major developments and support issues.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Key Competencies:<\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Problem Solving<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Initiative<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Results Orientation<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Interpersonal Skills<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Orientation to Details<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>Responsibilities:<\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Technical skills in SQL Server and Oracle to include database administration tasks such as maintenance and tuning, database architecture, concepts, and routine DBA maintenance.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Installs, configures, upgrades, patches, and operates Valero’s databases to maintain availability, optimal performance, and compliance with Valero standards.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Proactively identifies and assesses any issues, performs troubleshooting, researches solutions focusing on root cause.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Works hands-on as a team member covering all facets of database administration from installation to query and database tuning, as well as standards development, documentation, and working with other technical staff to ensure the database environment is robust and meets the customer’s needs.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensures the proper use of indexes and other database objects to enable desired functionality.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Partners with developers to build expertise in tuning tools to ensure we are achieving acceptable performance level statistics.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Works with infrastructure teams to ensure database and operating system monitoring are providing a complete readiness view.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Performs analysis on and recommends quality complex solutions to information system infrastructure technology disciplines\u002Fcomponents.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Provides continuous inputs in maintaining software development processes and standards.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Occasionally leads projects or tasks.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Works independently and efficiently with minimal supervision. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>May be required to work off-hours and on weekends for projects and\u002For support.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Some travel may be required.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>Our goal at Valero is to continue to be the premier manufacturer, distributor, and marketer of quality transportation fuels and petrochemical feedstocks, while serving the needs of our employees, communities and stakeholders.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>This position is salaried exempt status, which means you are not eligible for overtime pay.<\u002Fp> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <b> Qualifications<\u002Fb>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <p><br> Minimum Requirements:<\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Bachelor’s degree in MIS, Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology or related field, or equivalent required.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>5 years of DBA experience with SQL Server 2016 or higher or Oracle 12c or higher required.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with tuning PL\u002FSQL or T-SQL in order to advise developers and be very comfortable with multiple operating systems (Windows 2016\u002F2019, HP-UX and Linux) required.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>Preferred Requirements:<\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Windows PowerShell scripting experience.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), Reporting Services (SSRS), and Policy Management.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with SAP HANA.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>Benefits:<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Need more reasons to work for a company that is both professionally challenging and culturally rewarding?<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Take a look at some of our best-in-class benefits:<\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Competitive Pay and Annual Bonus Program<\u002Fli> \n   <li>100% match on 401(K) up to 7%, with immediate vesting<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Company-sponsored Pension Plan<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Comprehensive Healthcare and Wellness Programs<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Onsite Daycare Center<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Onsite Employee &amp; Family Wellness Center<\u002Fli> \n   <li>State-of-the-art 24-hour Fitness Center free for employees and spouses with access to Tennis and Basketball Facilities<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Onsite cafeteria open for breakfast and lunch<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A sprawling campus with walking paths and access to biking\u002Fhiking on the greenbelt.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>Position level and salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.<br> <br> Valero's employees are the heart of its success, and there is a reason why the company is an employer of choice in the fuels manufacturing and marketing industry. It’s not just the excellent benefits package, or the opportunities for personal growth, it’s also the caring and committed culture of the organization that makes everyone feel like they’re truly part of a team. <div>\n  Business Systems Design Architect - SAP PM\u002FEAM-22001QR\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <b> Description<\u002Fb>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <p><br> Valero is the best-in-class producer of essential fuels and products that are foundational to modern life. The world requires reliable, affordable and sustainable energy and we see this as an opportunity.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Our 10,000 employees work together as a team to relentlessly pursue excellence; embrace the highest standards of safety and responsible operations; leverage our creativity and technical expertise to solve challenging problems; care about our employees and the communities where we work and live; and recognize integrity is critical to our ongoing success.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>As a <b>Business Systems Design Architect - SAP PM\u002FEAM <\u002Fb>on the Maintenance, Turnaround, &amp; Procurement Systems team within the Valero’s Information Systems division you will design and implement digital business solutions for Valero's plant maintenance, turnaround, reliability, procurement, and warehouse functions. As an Architect you will help drive the strategy, architecture, innovation, and maintenance for our business application landscape. The primary focus will be the planning and execution of projects that leverage technology to accomplish strategic business objectives, but you will also be involved in supporting existing applications. You will help improve business processes and maximize production uptime across 15 refineries, 12 ethanol plants, 3 green diesel facilities, and pipelines &amp; terminals. Hybrid schedule available.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>At Valero we are committed to advancing the future of energy through innovation, ingenuity and unmatched execution. <\u002Fp>\n  <p><b>You can help achieve this goal if you can: <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Ensure harmonization among business strategies, digital transformation activities, and technology direction.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Perform analysis and recommend high quality solutions for business processes.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Stay abreast of emerging technologies and business process trends to bring in new ideas for improvement.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manage multiple concurrent projects and be engaged in all aspects of the project lifecycle (<i>e.g<\u002Fi>.: forecasting and planning, budgeting, status reporting, presenting to management, <i>etc.<\u002Fi>)<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Collaborate across the organization and with outside parties to deliver solutions.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensure the Valero technical architecture meets business needs while maintaining Valero IT standards for security, cost of ownership, reliability, quality, and ease of support\u002Fupgrade.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Help establish and improve strategies, policies, standards, and practices.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Engage in all phases of the application development lifecycle (e.g. requirements gathering, planning, analysis, architecture, design, implementation, and support)<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>This position is salaried exempt status, which means you are not eligible for overtime pay.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Key competencies required for in Valero’s IT team are: Problem Solving, Initiative, Results Orientation, and Interpersonal Skills.<\u002Fp> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <b> Qualifications<\u002Fb>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <p><b><br> Minimum Requirements:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>A bachelor's degree (or higher) in Computer Science, MIS, Engineering, Information Technology, or related field, or equivalent required. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>At least 10 years designing, architecting, configuring, implementing, and supporting SAP Plant Maintenance (PM)\u002FEnterprise Asset Management (EAM) and Materials Management (MM) required. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>At least 4 years of direct and\u002For indirect supervisory experience required.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Strong communication skills with substantial senior management interactions required. <\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><b>Preferred Requirements:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Oil &amp; Gas industry or related business\u002FIT knowledge in enterprise asset management or turnarounds.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with SAP MDG Equipment Management and\u002For Oracle Primavera P6.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with SAP S4 HANA.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with SAP PM\u002FMM touch points and integration of SAP and non-SAP components<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with effective use of SAP PPM (Portfolio and Project Management) module and project administration.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience debugging in SAP, SQL Queries, ABAP, or other technical tools\u002Fskills.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in business analytics and various data visualization tools such as SAP Business Intelligence, SAP Analysis for Office, Microsoft Power BI, SQL Server Reporting Studio, or others.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience with Agile or other project methodologies.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful> \n  <p>Need more reasons to work for a company that is both professionally challenging and culturally rewarding? Take a look at some of our best-in-class benefits: <\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Competitive Pay and Annual Bonus Program <\u002Fli>\n   <li>100% match on 401(K) up to 7%, with immediate vesting <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Company-sponsored Pension Plan <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Comprehensive Healthcare and Wellness Programs <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Onsite Daycare Center <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Onsite Employee &amp; Family Wellness Center <\u002Fli>\n   <li>State-of-the-art 24-hour Fitness Center free for employees and spouses with access to Tennis and Basketball Facilities <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Onsite cafeteria open for breakfast and lunch <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Sprawling campus with walking paths and access to biking\u002Fhiking on the greenbelt <\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p>The above description reflects the primary job function and may not include all detailed job functions performed in the role.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>All successful candidates must be eligible to obtain a TWIC card (Transportation Worker Identification Credential). It is Valero’s policy that employees must wear this card at all times while working at the refinery. Please review eligibility criteria at <b>https:\u002F\u002Fwww.tsa.gov\u002Ffor-industry\u002Ftwic<\u002Fb>.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Position level and salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.<\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <p><br> Valero's employees are the heart of its success, and there is a reason why the company is an employer of choice in the fuels manufacturing and marketing industry. It’s not just the excellent benefits package, or the opportunities for personal growth, it’s also the caring and committed culture of the organization that makes everyone feel like they’re truly part of a team. For more information, visit Valero.com.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Valero is an EEO\u002FAA Employer. All qualified applicants are encouraged to apply and will receive consideration for employment without regard to legally protected status, including race\u002Fethnicity, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, gender identity and sexual orientation), national origin, age, disability, protected veteran or any other status protected by applicable federal, state or local laws.<\u002Fp> \n  <p>Please be advised, if you are viewing this position on a website that lists an estimated salary rate\u002Frange, it was not provided by Valero.
